TextBlock.Text: In this place, the <color=purple>Heart of the Bramble</color>, we believe we have discovered the means by which we may finally reach the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>.
Being here allows us to commune with the <color=purple>Bramble</color> like never before, to hear and be heard by it in a way that our people have never been able to.

Through a joint effort between the Nomai and the Dree, we believe we may finally reach the <color=orange>Eye</color>, encouraging the <color=purple>Bramble</color> to grow a node near our destination.
